plot: A man walks around the streets of Santiago with a turban, a long beard and a strange metal bracelet around his hand. In the street people yell "Osama", "Terrorist", but he's not any of these things.
title: Sikh en Santiago
plot_es: A man walks around the streets of Santiago with a turban, a long beard and a strange metal bracelet around his hand. In the street people yell "Osama", "Terrorist", but he's not any of these things.
plot_en: A man walks around the streets of Santiago with a turban, a long beard and a strange metal bracelet around his hand. In the street people yell "Osama", "Terrorist", but he's not any of these things.

produce.name: Escuela de Cine de la Universidad ARCIS
